room_title: Escape room "The Rise of Scorpio" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
room_address: 304 SW Market Street Lee’s Summit, MO 64063
room_description: You are a team of ICON agents on a mission to find your missing comrade. He was last known to be infiltrating a suspected villain’s compound, but you’ve lost communication with him. Your mission, find your fellow agent and discover the truth about the nefarious Dr. Scorpio.
